bibl.title: Techniques of Reading and Textual Layout in Ancient Greek Texts.

series.title: Proceedings of the Cambridge Philological Society
PCPS

bibl.note: Paper presented at the 'Cognitive Classics' conference on July 4-5, 2008 in London and at the University of California, Davis, on April 27, 2009. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Cognitive aspects of reading. - 3. The layout of Greek papyri: Johnson. - 4. Stichometry. - 5. Reading philosophy. - 6. Musical scores. - 7. Colometry of lyric texts.
